viralPosts.text: Electronic machines that *also* produce a paper ballot are good, but using paper ballots only would make voting inaccessible to people who are blind/low vision. #CripTheVote
viralPosts.author: brassclothes.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
Keep being loud, it works!!! 
#Disabilitysky #CripTheVote

viralPosts.author: embeessem.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
Just #DanielleSmith doing more ghoulish #UCP things. If a “decision” hasn’t been made by Feb 28, 2026, they’ll cut $200/month from disabled Albertans already struggling to survive.
Meanwhile, the CRA’s CDB backlog is 5–6 months.
#ableg #abpoli #cdnpoli #DisabilityRights #AISH #yyc #yeg
viralPosts.author: sillyrabbitfafo.bsky.social

viralPosts.text: We're thinking about these powerful words from disability justice activist @miamingus.bsky.social, and reflecting on all the work we must do to keep fighting for Long COVID justice and #disabilityjustice!
viralPosts.author: longcovidjustice.org

viralPosts.text:
I finally get to announce that I wrote a chapter for the upcoming book titled “Digital Accessibility Ethics: Disability Inclusion in All Things Tech." The book will be published on March 26, 2026, and is available for pre-order 

#DigitalAccessibilityEthics #Ethics #accessibility #Disabilit
viralPosts.author: scopicengineer.com

viralPosts.text: #a11y
viralPosts.author: spavel.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
Hey! @lflegal.bsky.social, @rejinae.bsky.social, and @chanceyfleet.bsky.social gathered 36 authors to write about ethics in digital accessibility.

Chapters, authors (I’m one of them), pre-order:
www.routledge.com/Digital-Acce...

Out 26 March 2026.

#DigitalAccessibilityEthics #accessibility #a11y
viralPosts.author: aardrian.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
Today I had to vote on a school bond to *bring local schools into compliance with the ADA." Read that again. 

I was 15 when the ADA passed and my old schools are STILL NOT ACCESSIBLE. I am 50 now, almost 51.

#CripTheVote

viralPosts.text: I am happy to announce this book that i wrote a chapter in. My chapter looks at the ethics of #accessibility #sustainability and #OpenSource so touches on many threads. It is amazing to have contributed a small part of this first work of accessibility ethics. www.routledge.com/Digital-Acce...
viralPosts.author: ox.ca

viralPosts.text: Folks will not provide ALT TEXT for images, yet, will write very detailed and descriptive prompts to get the right image for Gen #AI. Make it make sense. There's a talk and presentation tucked away in there. #a11y
